page.title: 13RECREATION IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: The golf course at Woodhall Spa is one of the most famous in England and it hosts many important national championships.Entertainment facilities are also available at Jubilee Park which contains a putting green,tennis courts and a cafe.There is also bowling available at the park and a heated swimming pool next to which is a children's play area with swings,a slide,a see-saw,a climbing frame and a sand pit.In the evening the nearby kinema is available which is famous for it's system of projecting the film on to the rear of the screen. Woodhall Spa is popular with tourists, having plenty of places at which to eat,drink and stay overnight.
